content: website is in german and pattern or images may have been archived 2005 however a pdf version is still available german 1 english 2 errata noted by flamingo8228 it seems to me there s a mistake in the english version of the pattern i m pretty sure there s an extra chain 3 in round 2 i think round 2 should read chain 3 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet through chain chain 3 2 double_crochet through chain 3 double_crochet no chain 3 here 2 double_crochet through chain ch3 2 double_crochet through chain 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet through chain etc… 1 http //www stricksucht de/anleitungen/haekelbeutel pdf 2 http //www stricksucht de/anleitungen/crochetedbag pdf
